findName

public static int findName(java.lang.String name)
Searches through the list of players by name when a player logs in.

Parameters:
name - The name a user has entered to log in.
Returns:
Returns the index in the list of the player found, or returns -1 if the player is not found.

Collision

public static boolean Collision()
Checks if there is a collision between any two objects, and takes away health points from each player as necessary.

Returns:
Raturns true if one player's spaceship is destroyed, false otherwise.
